item.title: Inauguration of Rs.936 crore development works in Raichur constituency;Blessings of the people of Raichur district are always with us:CM Siddaramaiah
item.description:
<![CDATA[Sunil Lohan
*Kalyana Karnataka is a Congress stronghold:CM thanks people for victory in 5 Lok Sabha Seats.
*CM exposes price rise under Modi Government:Gold, Silver,Rice,Cooking Oil,Gas,Petrol,Diesel,Fertilizer prices have skyrocketed.
Development works worth Rs.936 crore were inaugurated in Raichur constituency today,reaffirming the Congress Government’s commitment to delivering on its promises,said Chief Minister Siddaramaiah.
He was speaking after inaugurating the Tribal Cultural Festival...]]>
item.author: Vipin Gaur

item.title: Raichur: Man undresses himself,behaves indecently, for being questioned for traveling without ticket
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur: Man undresses himself,behaves indecently, for being questioned for traveling without ticket
Vartha Bharati | 24-06-2025 | 21:01:00 IST
Raichur: A male passenger who allegedly boarded an AC coach without a valid ticket at Raichur railway station was seen behaving indecently with a female passenger after being questioned. A video of the incident is now going viral on social media platforms.
According to sources, when confronted for not having a ticket, the man reportedly undressed ...]]>
item.author: Vartha Bharathi

item.title: Rahul Raichur (IRS) appointed as PS to Union Minister Pralhad Joshi
item.description:
<![CDATA[Minister Joshi holds charge of the Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Food & Public Distribution and the Ministry of New & Renewable Energy.
According to an official order issued by the Department of Personnel and Training (DoPT), Raichur will serve at the level of Deputy Secretary in the Ministry of New & Renewable Energy. His appointment is effective from the date he assumes charge and will continue until February 20, 2028 — the balance period of his five-year central deputation tenure — or until ...]]>
item.author: Psu Watch Bureau
